title: Okta
content:
[PANEL] Hi, there! Simpli.fi uses Okta to not only enhance application security, but also to streamline application login processes. In our pursuit of a password-less reality, we use Okta to prepare for a future in which users can log into their work computer and automatically be logged into all applications for their workday. As we travel toward that ideal, the Digital Workplace team is here to share knowledge, answer questions, and address buggy behaviors…
